channel.title: CK's English Study Podcast
channel.description: MP3 Files to Help You Study English
channel.itunes:author: English

item.title: Skin Care: Small Cuts
item.description: Even minor cuts can become infected if they are left untreated. Any break in the skin can let bacteria enter the body. An increasing number of bacterial skin infections are resistant to antibiotic medicines. These infections can spread throughout the body.
item.author: English
item.itunes:author: English

item.title: Hell's Kitchen (Manhattan, New York) 4:20
item.description: How did the area get the name Hell's Kitchen?There are several possible answers.Some people say it was the traditional name of a building in the area.The building was in bad condition and the people who lived there were very poor.
item.author: English
item.itunes:author: English

item.title: Graham Caldwell (The Artist) - Part 2
item.description: Graham Caldwell makes many of his glass sculptures in his workshop near Washington, D.C.
item.author: English
item.itunes:author: English

item.title: Graham Caldwell (The Artist) - Part 1
item.description: Graham Caldwell is a young artist who makes magical and unusual sculptures out of glass and metal.
item.author: English
item.itunes:author: English

item.title: Learn "Auld Lang Syne" (蛍の光) & YouTube
item.description: YouTube is another Internet site that became more popular this year.
item.author: English
item.itunes:author: English

item.title: Marilyn Manroe (1926-1962) 12:41
item.description: Her name at birth was Norma Jean Baker. Her life as a child was like a bad dream. She lived with a number of different people, and often was mistreated.
item.author: English
item.itunes:author: English

item.title: Boys Schools - Girls Schools (0:25)
item.description: Some educators say children can learn better in single-sex schools. Others disagree. Researchers have shown that boys and girls learn information in different ways. However, research about the effects of same-sex schools has shown mixed results.
item.author: English
item.itunes:author: English

item.title: ADVANCED: Eat Less, Live Longer (1:48)
item.description: Scientists have known for some time that laboratory mice on a low calorie diet live longer than mice that eat as much as they want.
item.author: English
item.itunes:author: English
